column.name: text
column.value:
Hello World!
This is the first post.

column.name: text
column.value: In a flooded selection of overly complex solutions, Dropplets has been created in order to deliver a much needed alternative. There is something to be said about true simplicity in the design, development and management of a blog. By eliminating all of the unnecessary elements found in typical solutions, Dropplets can focus on pure design, typography and usability. Welcome to an easier way to blog.";

column.name: text
column.value:
About this repository This repository contains the latest version of PrestaShop: version 1.6. You can learn more about the new features of this version on the progress page.
Clicking the “Download ZIP” button from the root of this repository will download the current state of PrestaShop 1.6 — a branch that is in active development, and ready for production use. Note that the ZIP file will not contain the default modules: you need to make a recursive clone using Git in order to download these files too. See CONTRIBUTING.md for more information about using Git.
